Statute.Title: Intellectual Property Law Improvement Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Actualisation du droit de la propriété intellectuelle, Loi d’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1993, c. 15, ss. 2 to 10, 12 to 25, 50, 51, 57 to 64 and 67 to 72 in force 09.06.93 see SI/93‑84; ss. 1, 11, 65 and 66 in force 15.01.94 see SI/93‑224; ss. 26 to 49 and 52 to 56 in force 01.10.96 see SI/96‑81
